committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolution offering a congressional salute to four New Jersey aviation pioneers upon their induction into the Teterboro Aviation Hall of Fame, New Jersey's only aviation museum: Samuel C. Barnitt, Louis G. Ranley, Ben B. Brock, and posthumously to the late Charles "Slim" West.

summary.text: Congratulates Samuel C. Barnitt, Louis G. Ranley, Ben B. Rock, and the late Charles "Slim" West, four New Jersey aviation pioneers, upon their induction into the Teterboro Aviation Hall of Fame.

titles.title: Resolution offering a congressional salute to four New Jersey aviation pioneers upon their induction into the Teterboro Aviation Hall of Fame, New Jersey's only aviation museum: Samuel C. Barnitt, Louis G. Ranley, Ben B. Brock, and posthumously to the late Charles "Slim" West.
